biotools.summary: Ebolabase is a comprehensive source for ebola-human interactions has been developed. Ebolabase contains experimentally verified entries of ebola-human interactions. The interactions are visualized as network images. This study provides the information to understand the ebola pathogenesis and also to identify the re-purposing drugs.
